post.preview: Hello World! I finally decided to make a blog to put my ramblings and projects. After some deliberation I settled on using next.js, so I can use React+TypeScript, don’t need a server and the website is accessible without JS enabled. The content is written as markdown, though I’m adding some neat

c.c: Hello World! I finally decided to make a blog to put my ramblings and projects.
After some deliberation I settled on using next.js, so I can use React+TypeScript, don’t need a server and the website is accessible without JS enabled.
, though I’m adding some neat stuff so I can do stuff like this:

c:
```barchart
title: Awesomeness of my blog
series: Awesomeness from 1 to 10
data:
    mine: 11
    hediet's: 5
```

title: Awesomeness of my blog
series: Awesomeness from 1 to 10
data:
    mine: 11
    hediet's: 5
